statements: SELECT * FROM spare_parts_inventory;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM spare_parts_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT part_id, part_name, quantity, storage_location FROM spare_parts_inventory WHERE storage_location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM spare_parts_inventory WHERE last_restock_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM spare_parts_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM spare_parts_inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY part_id DESC, last_restock_date ASC
SELECT part_name, storage_location, last_restock_date FROM spare_parts_inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY part_name ASC
SELECT part_id, part_name, quantity FROM spare_parts_inventory WHERE storage_location = 'Warehouse A'
SELECT * FROM spare_parts_inventory WHERE last_restock_date > '2021-06-01' AND storage_location LIKE '%Zone%' ORDER BY quantity DESC, part_name ASC
SELECT part_id, part_name, storage_location FROM spare_parts_inventory WHERE part_name IN ('Bolt', 'Nut', 'Screw') ORDER BY storage_location DESC, part_name ASC
SELECT * FROM spare_parts;
SELECT part_name, part_category FROM spare_parts ORDER BY part_category ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM spare_parts WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT part_name, technician_name, maintenance_date FROM spare_parts INNER JOIN maintenance_records ON spare_parts.part_id = maintenance_records.part_id;
SELECT * FROM spare_parts WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY part_name DESC;
SELECT part_name, part_category, quantity FROM spare_parts WHERE part_category = 'Engine' ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT s.part_name, m.maintenance_date, m.technician_name, m.cost FROM maintenance_records m JOIN spare_parts s ON m.part_id = s.part_id ORDER BY m.maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT s.part_name, COUNT(m.record_id) AS maintenance_count FROM spare_parts s LEFT JOIN maintenance_records m ON s.part_id = m.part_id GROUP BY s.part_id HAVING maintenance_count > 5;
SELECT m.technician_name, AVG(m.cost) AS avg_cost FROM maintenance_records m GROUP BY m.technician_name HAVING avg_cost > 500 ORDER BY avg_cost DESC;
SELECT id, part_name, quantity FROM SpareParts;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM Suppliers;
SELECT component_name, quantity, part_id FROM Components;
SELECT * FROM SpareParts WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(id) AS total_parts FROM SpareParts GROUP BY supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM SpareParts WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY part_name ASC;
SELECT part_name, location FROM SpareParts WHERE location LIKE '%Warehouse%';
SELECT part_name, supplier_name FROM SpareParts JOIN Suppliers ON SpareParts.supplier_id = Suppliers.id;
SELECT s.part_name, c.component_name FROM SpareParts s INNER JOIN Components c ON s.id = c.part_id ORDER BY s.part_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS part_count FROM SpareParts JOIN Suppliers ON SpareParts.supplier_id = Suppliers.id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM spare_parts;
SELECT part_id, part_name, unit_price FROM spare_parts WHERE part_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact, supplier_address FROM suppliers;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM spare_parts WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT record_id, part_id, technician_name, description FROM maintenance_records ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM spare_parts;
SELECT part_name, part_category, unit_price FROM spare_parts WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY part_category DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact, supplier_address FROM suppliers WHERE LENGTH(supplier_address) > 10;
SELECT part_name, quantity, unit_price, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE total_price > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT record_id, part_id, date, technician_name, description FROM maintenance_records WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM spare_parts;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM spare_parts WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT component_name, vendor_name, price FROM components ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT maintenance_date, technician FROM maintenance_log WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT repair_id, repair_type FROM repairs WHERE repair_type = 'Preventive Maintenance';
SELECT * FROM spare_parts WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM spare_parts ORDER BY part_name DESC;
SELECT component_name, vendor_name, price FROM components WHERE price < 1000;
SELECT maintenance_date, technician FROM maintenance_log WHERE technician LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM repairs WHERE repair_type = 'Scheduled' ORDER BY repair_date DESC;
